title: Can't downgrade my Pixel to Android 9 because of locked "OEM unlock".
content: I want to downgrade my Pixel to Android 9 but cant do this, because of locked "OEM unlock" function in developer menu. My phone is buyed in Verizon, so I call to it support but there told me that cant help with this unlock and I need to contact with manufactured of this phone. How can I activate "OEM unlock" function to downgrade my phone? Thank you!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
